title: Science Education Curriculum Through Open and Distance Learning (ODL)

context.additional_context: Conducted in an asynchronous learning environment using digital devices, learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments. Designed to enable learners from diverse socioeconomic backgrounds to access science education via an ODL (Open and Distance Learning) system.

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific inquiry methods using Open and Distance Learning (ODL) platforms.
Learners can complete projects that solve real-life problems by analyzing science materials provided within the LMS.
Learners can enhance collaboration skills with peers through online discussion and feedback systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
